welcome_message_body: Welcome to Visalia, where small-town charm meets big-city amenities. Known for its beautiful parks, historic downtown, and proximity to the stunning Sequoia and Kings Canyon National Parks, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that Visalia has to offer.

restaurants.name: El Rosal Authentic Mexican Restaurant.
restaurants.description: El Rosal Authentic Mexican Restaurant. is a mexican restaurant located in Visalia.

restaurants.name: Zen Asian Diner
restaurants.description: Zen Asian Diner is a chinese restaurant located in Visalia.

restaurants.name: The Habit Burger Grill
restaurants.description: The Habit Burger Grill is a burger joint located in Visalia.
restaurants.address: 604 S Mooney Blvd (at W. Myrtle Ave.), Visalia, CA 93277

restaurants.name: Osaka Sushi & Japanese Cuisine
restaurants.description: Osaka Sushi & Japanese Cuisine is a sushi restaurant located in Visalia.

restaurants.name: In-N-Out Burger
restaurants.description: In-N-Out Burger is a fast food restaurant located in Visalia.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Porterville Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options, retail stores, and car rental services.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Porterville Airport is dedicated to handling freight and cargo shipments, with state-of-the-art facilities and equipment.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
